website_summaries.verdict: A bright and eye-catching vest comes in multiple sizes to fit your pup for all-season wear.
pros: Vibrant color is hard to miss
Features multiple reflective strips and paw prints which are visible from 500' at night
Rip-resistant fabric is breathable, yet completely waterproof, making it suitable for all weather use
Easy to get on and off
Lightweight and adjustable for a comfortable fit
Excellent quality for a great price
cons: Great for everyday walks, but some users felt the Velcro fasteners came undone too easily in wooded areas
Might not perform well in thick underbrush or wooded areas

customer_reviews.title: Large fits our 45 pound mutt perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I had first ordered a medium (I guessed without measuring), but that was much too small for our 45 pound mutt. The large fits him perfectly and doesn't bother him at all. Since we live in a wooded area, he will be wearing this outside all through hunting season, so I was glad to see that he doesn't mind wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Dog Vest Bright
customer_reviews.text: My Border Terrier is 15lbs which kind of falls between XS and small. Since I was using this for hiking, I went with the XS, for I was concerned it would not stay on. Turns out I made the right choice, it fits snug enough that it stayed on the whole 6mi walk even when the dog frequently runs through the thick brush. It's bright color makes her easy to spot as well. Very satisfied thus far. Will see how long it lasts
customer_reviews.author: Harry Downing

customer_reviews.title: This is awesome. I take my dog running at night
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome. I take my dog running at night, especially during the winter when it gets dark early. It's extremely reflective and gives me peace of mind while running on the sidewalk next to a busy road. It also fits perfectly based on his size/measurements and the chart it provides for reference. He wears a harness and the vest fits over it very well, and it's lightweight. He doesn't mind wearing it at all and actually gets excited when I put it on him because he knows it's time to go for a run!
customer_reviews.author: Brook Morley

customer_reviews.title: Best fitting dog vest we've found, and it's BRIGHT!
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised to see that our dog should get a medium size (other brands have said "large" for his size), but I followed the seller's measurement instructions, and that's what came up. IT FITS PERFECTLY! Also, the orange is VERY bright, which is just what we need to keep the hunters on our mountain from mistaking our dog for something they're allowed to shoot. The velcro makes it easy to dress and undress him, and he seems quite comfortable while wearing the vest. Now I just hope that it lasts longer than the other brands we've tried--so far, so good (after about a week of wearing it daily as he roams the mountainside).
customer_reviews.author: Martha Welsh

customer_reviews.title: Good coverage protection for your pet.
customer_reviews.text: I thought the fabric would be a little heavier and warmer. It is actually just a covering for the dog's protection. I have a 115 lb black lab. I ordered the x-large and it is a good fit. It is bright orange with reflective gray strips and lettering. It will offer protection from hunters but will not be warm for your dog. It provides plenty of coverage, which I like. I will mention it does have a slot for a lead if you dog wears a harness. I am not sure how the fabric will hold up in the brush as it may snag easily. However, for just walking your pet on the sidewalk, it is pretty classy.
customer_reviews.author: eve

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stay on my dog - just slips under his belly.
customer_reviews.text: I have a 75lb golden and got the XL based on the suggested sizes. It is good in size but the under-belly strap is like 10" too long. The velcro does not run the whole length of the strap so I cannot tighten it up on him. Thus it just slides around on him and gets in his way. Hope to donate it to someone with a very fat dog. Or spend the money and time to fix the strap myself.
customer_reviews.author: Minij

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent product
customer_reviews.text: I needed a reflective vest for each of my two dogs - similar sized. I wasn't sure of the fit, so I initially only ordered 1 vest (size Large). It fit both dogs, so I went on Amazon and used the re-order function to order a second one. The second one we received was also labeled size "Large", but it was a different material and design (which would not have been a big deal), but also MUCH smaller. It was a size more suitable for a cocker spaniel.
customer_reviews.author: Active-in-NH

customer_reviews.title: Velcro stitching busted on first use...maybe I just got a bad one.  Replaced with a Ruff Wear that was much tougher
customer_reviews.text: Well, the vest looked great for the 1 time I got to use it. On it's first use, as I pulled the velcro strap apart, all the stitching came undone and rendered the vest useless. So much for the 'extra stitched' velcro straps. Lots of people love this vest so maybe I just got a bad one. I replaced it with a Ruff Wear vest which was built MUCH tougher (albeit at 3x the cost :( )
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Order larger
customer_reviews.text: We have 2 shepherds that are around 80 pounds each. I ordered the large size but they fit neither dog so I returned them for x-large which fir well. We’ve only had the. A couple of weeks but one has a hole in the back and the Velcro strap that goes over the abdomen is coming off. Some of the grey detriment is also hanging off. The other one is in better shape but the Velcro clogged up so it doesn’t stay on. They worked great for a couple of weeks but we still have a week of deer hunting left
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect vests!
customer_reviews.text: We love our new reflector vests! They are the perfect size. We ordered the large and they are perfect! Our dogs think they are extra special parading around on trails with those safety vests. The orange is soooo bright and the strips are placed well, even the puppy print . The shipping was fast and I would definitely buy from this seller again. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: F. Kutscher

customer_reviews.title: Great for early morning puppy walks
customer_reviews.text: My workday starts at 7, which is no problem in the summer as it gets light before 5. However, we don’t really have a lot of light right now- the color is hunter blaze and is super visible in the early morning light. I got a medium (I think she was 28 lbs when I purchased this). When it arrived I thought it was too small, but I adjusted the velcro straps and it was perfect. She is 35 lbs now and there’s plenty of room for her to grow. Super easy to put on - which is important, especially because she’s a wriggly puppy.
customer_reviews.author: Kimbo

customer_reviews.title: Good in theory only
customer_reviews.text: All of the categories listed got high marks, however the one question they didn't ask because they probably already knew the answer was how well it's made. One word, CHEAP. On the first wear my dog came back without it. We live on a farm with lots of woods and neighbors allow hunting. Therefore the idea was for her to have a reflective orange vest while playing with the other dogs. I noticed it was hard to get the tabs to align in a snug fit and had some concerns. Sure enough, my girl came without it. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Maui Kat

customer_reviews.title: Poor Construction. Not Waterproof. Won't hold up to active dogs
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item a month ago. the vest it self did not fit well. my dog would loose it running threw the fields. The material is light weight but also fabric... not a waterproof material and stretches like a nylon. This vest last 3 weeks. The slit for the leash attachment, which we never used ripped and is now just a gapping hole. I personally do not recommend this vest. There are better out there. We thought we ordered the same as our previous one which lasted over a year of hard wear but we go this thing instead. We were very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: kani

customer_reviews.title: Great visibility
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 Vizslas who are deer colored. I use orange vests to make sure they are safe running in the fields and small woods near my home during hunting season. They could easily be mistaken for deer in the woods. These vests are bright and cannot be mistaken for anything other than hunting dogs.These are high energy dogs who need lots of exercise every day so these vests allow me to do just that safely. My only complaint is that one velcro strip was coming loose and I had to sew it but good value for the price. I would recommend these to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Doreen B.

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase this
customer_reviews.text: The velcro on this reflective vest is terrible. My dog had a different brand vest for 2 years , until she was sprayed by a skunk & I had to throw it in the trash we never had a problem with her losing the other vest in the woods. I had this vest for less than 5 days when it was came off of her and I could not find it. We are out on remote Trails 7 days a week and must have reliable reflective vest. I'm very disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Hummin8284

customer_reviews.title: Safety First for my BFF!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this vest and sits patiently while I put it on her. The material is great and I like the reflective feature. I bought a large for my 55# dog - which fits her comfortably with room to spare. Her weight would have been on the top end for a size medium. I feel much safer walking her through the woods during hunting season!
customer_reviews.author: Julie B

customer_reviews.title: Great for fussy adult cats!
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased a total of 11 reflective vests prior to finding these and found that not only did the cats hate them, the amount of reflective surface was so tiny that it couldn't be viewed from enough distance to make the cats noticeable in the event they wandered onto the street. These are perfect, they are visible for a block and the cats aren't trying to chew them off so they must be comfortable! Note, I ordered an XS for my adult cats and it fits great!
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Packaged poorly and sized wrong
customer_reviews.text: At first glance I was kind of taken back at how bad this was packaged. The vest was wrinkled and disheveled. But, whatever I can get past that. When I took it out of the packaging I instantly knew there was no way this was going to fit my 45 lb dog. I ordered a medium by the way. It was so small and the straps from end to end was only 73 centimeters which is about 20 centimeters too short to wrap around my dog's belly. The material is very lightweight but I can't imagine it holding up with any play. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for dogs who run through bushes
customer_reviews.text: The vest would be perfect for a dog that stays on the trail. We have 3 dogs. One of the vest fell off in the bushes and the other got ripped. I have replaced the vests with another brand. The new brand has buckles instead of Velcro and the material is of higher quality.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Good for civilized pooches
customer_reviews.text: The large size fits my 70 pounds dog quite well. The medium barely worked for my 45-pound dog, who has a deep chest. The material is very lightweight, which makes it comfortable for them to wear, but that also means it can be torn easily due to contact with trees, shrubs, fences, etc. And because my dogs run off leash (vigorously), the Velcro needed to be reinforced with buttons because the vests would loosen and come off.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela of the Mesa

customer_reviews.title: Bright and reflective
customer_reviews.text: This is bright, reflective and easy to put on. My dog ripped a small hole in it the first day from the tumble weed she got stuck in. We take them in the hills to run and recently people are shooting up there. We try to be very careful and stay away from people and those areas, but I felt the vest was an extra safety precaution. I bought the extra large and it works but I think I should have bought a large. I have a Golden and a Black Lab.
customer_reviews.author: vera

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!!!
customer_reviews.text: This vest is excellent and literally saved my dogs life this weekend. He got out the front door as we were getting ready to go for a walk and ran out to play in the snowy field across the street. There was a car coming and thankfully they saw him and were able to stop, because of the vest. He is the same color as the snow and it was sunset, it's very unlikely they would have seen him otherwise. I am so thankful I had the forethought to order the vest for him.
customer_reviews.author: Kim T

customer_reviews.title: Not even a month and falling apart
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I well my dog has had this less than a month and it’s already falling apart the sad part is he only wears it to out down in the horse filed to potty then right back it’s not like he is in the woods running deer very disappointing my boy and I really liked it at first but not not WOYLD I RECOMMEND-NO WOULD I BUY AGAIN-NO
customer_reviews.author: angie

customer_reviews.title: Fits her great..
customer_reviews.text: I have a medium to small boarder collie and I bought the XL. Fits her great... we have lots of woods around us and when she wears this she is Very visible. Cleans up great... I have hand scrubbed it in the sink and washed it in the machine and it comes out CLEAN and just like new. Is made very well and is very reflective also! Buy one! they are great !!
customer_reviews.author: Oden

customer_reviews.title: Great for late night walks, light and well made
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this vest for several months. I like it and my dog doesn't mind it. The vest seems comfortable and velcro gives plenty of room for adjustments. It's well made and easy to clean. My dog is 50 lbs goldendoodle and it fits her well. We used it in a forest during the day - and it was easy to keep an eye on my pupu running off leash. We also regularly use it for night time walks.
customer_reviews.author: Solovoice23

customer_reviews.title: This vest is a ripoff
customer_reviews.text: Ripoff! I bought a medium size vest for a 45 lbs border collie. It’s designed for a 20 lb dog. Fabric and Velcro are cheap as you can get. If your dog needs a vest like this, this vest will not stand up to an active dog. I’m REALLY disappointed this was an “amazon choice”. That recommendation went right down the sewer with my investment in this poor quality, deceptively marketed product.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Dodez

customer_reviews.title: excellent value`
customer_reviews.text: This turned out to be the perfect solution for our Great Pyranees-mix dog for walking in the snow. A white dog with brown spots can be very difficult to see day or night. We use a dog warmer blanket and this unit fits right over that and provides high visibility protection against erratic drivers any time of day.
customer_reviews.author: compostfan

customer_reviews.title: Sizing.  Your sizing was right on the money.
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I are very, very pleased with the reflective vest. It goes on so easily, our dog does not struggle with us when we are trying to put it on her. Once it is on, she totally forgets she has it and does not try to pull it off. The color and the reflective bands work very well too. We live in a hunting area so we needed something to let the hunters know our dog was not a deer or other animal to be shot at. I would recommend this product very highly as it was definitely worth the price. Sizing, ease of putting it on and priced right - you can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: old time movie lover

customer_reviews.title: BEST reflective vest! Great customer service!! ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
customer_reviews.text: Love these vests - VERY reflective. Perfect for sunset/evening walks, but also use during daytime for additional visibility. Well constructed, good quality - and I like the cute paw print. Convenient to have hole for connecting leash to harness. Also was very impressed with the fantastic customer service! ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
customer_reviews.author: FS

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: We have about an acre of our property fenced in for our three dogs. Although no hunters should get close, we wanted our dogs to stand out. These reflective vests are great. And at night with the spot lights on we can see and keep track of our dogs so easy. Of course they think they are pretty dogs with these on and they don't want us to take them off. Measured our dogs and went by the vest measurements. They fit great.
customer_reviews.author: S. McKibben

customer_reviews.title: Great doggy vest, easy to spot
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Yorkie so I could spot him when we go to the beach and he's running loose. His fur color blends right in with the sand and driftwood. He doesn't mind wearing it because it's lightweight and goes on and off easily. Great for in the dark with the reflective stripes.
customer_reviews.author: CMR

customer_reviews.title: Love that it came in a smaller size
customer_reviews.text: I had bought one a few years ago for my bigger dog and she got a xsmall in that brand. So I was looking for one that was small enough for the new puppy when I found this one. It fits great and it's more reflective than the other one I had previously bought. Plus it has a hole for his harness. Probably gonna buy a new one for my other dog.
customer_reviews.author: maj1913

customer_reviews.title: Highly Reflective
customer_reviews.text: Have a 1yr old 40lb boxer mix with a wide neck/slender chest and the Large fit easily with plenty of room at chest. Orange reflective vest is very bright for evening walks and simple to put on. Negatives are the logo is highly visible so my dog looks like a walking billboard for the company and made of very thin material - hoping it lasts. Overall it's okay but felt like there are cheaper options for the same.
customer_reviews.author: Lemon Not Lime

customer_reviews.title: Fits great, highly reflective.
customer_reviews.text: Fits great, lightweight, and my dog doesn't even seem to notice that she's wearing it. Very reflective and makes her highly visible when she's running through the woods, or hiking in the desert. Thanks! I got the Medium after measuring my dog, and it was sized accurately for my purebred "Navajo Shepherd"!
customer_reviews.author: Geogal

customer_reviews.title: Not For an Active Pup!
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for...if you only walk your dog along city streets and your dog never plays with another dog or runs in the woods this is a good reflective vest for your dog. But my shepherd pup tore it within a few days, just by running around and playing like a typical pup. I got her a Hurtta vest, it's holding up much better, fits better also. A. does not have the best price JFI.
customer_reviews.author: Gembug

customer_reviews.title: Awesome jacket!
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I was looking for! My dog is 65 pounds, I got the extra large because I wanted it to go over her winter jacket. I could have gone with the large instead, but the long Velcro strips make it super adjustable. She won't wear sweaters or anything too confining, we have a sweater graveyard as proof off that. But I don't think she even knew she had this on. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly McAdam

customer_reviews.title: Great for visibility
customer_reviews.text: We have 3 dogs and live in an area with gun happy hunters. We don't want outrpups to be mistaken for game(trust me, if you lived where we do, you'd understand). We purchased these last year for our dogs, but our puppy needed a larger size. The vests are quite bright and easy to see. No problems putting them on the dogs .
customer_reviews.author: Maria Hedetniemi-Martello

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.text: We live in the country and wanted this vest for our Golden Retriever during deer hunting season so that he is more visible. It is easy to put on, light weight and looks great on him! We love that he can wear it over his harness when we go for our walks and that there is an opening so that we can attach his leash. He weighs 67 lbs and the size large fits him well. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Very bright but
customer_reviews.text: Well made. I like the material. Color is. Dry bright and reflective. My on,y issue is they run small. I have a pretty slim pooch and the Large is just WAY to tight on her. Ive purchased the yellow color in the same size and it fit just fine. Just order the up size and you will be fine.
customer_reviews.author: amazoncustomer5

customer_reviews.title: Size is true, great reflectors
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 8-pound mini dachshund and it fit her perfectly. It's very easy to put on/take off and the color is nice and bright. Reflectors are a great touch. I live in the woods and all 3 of my dogs wear these vests during hunting season. Quality seems good.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Hoisington

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product for my picky dog
customer_reviews.text: My dog looks a lot like a deer and with it being hunting season needed to get him into something highly visible to keep him safe. He doesn’t like having to wear anything so finding something he likes is a challenge. This vest fits him perfect, is very lightweight, very visible and he doesn’t mind it on him at all! Great product at a great price! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: M. Huff

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Ploduct
customer_reviews.text: My only minor complaint is that on the product web page the sizing information is not completely accurate. The weight of the dog overlaps the medium and large sizes. My dog must be broad chested as her weight suggest I should get either medium or large and the medium was too small for the straps were not long enough to attach properly. The seller immediately and without question replaced the product with a large size which fits perfectly. My dog runs wildly in rocky, brushy areas and the vest is still in great condition after nearly six months.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Taylor

customer_reviews.title: size up
customer_reviews.text: We have a fairly short golden lab and I bought a medium or large and it was a bit small. Got him an XL and it fits well and has some extra room. Good Velcro, he wore it all over and it never came off. Also must be comfy because he usually freaks out with stuff like that on him and he loved it. Great reflective material, over all great product.
customer_reviews.author: Kait

customer_reviews.title: Would order again.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little jacket. High visibility. She blends in so well with her surroundings this has helped me keep track of her when camping. I love the fact that there is a hole for the leash to come out when we walk. Measured her purchase the size I needed for her perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what it is intended for.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 3-year-old, 45-lb border collie. this fits him well and is easy to put on. It does exactly what I needed to do, it makes him bright and easy to see, and adds reflective surfaces to his body. It also came with a little necklace glow ball thing. I don't know if I'll use it, but it's a nice added bonus to help illuminate him at night. He has a glow collar that I use but if it ever dies, it would be a good backup.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Bought for Cat
customer_reviews.text: Bought this dog vest for my black cat he’s about 15lbs. the extra small fits him perfect. The vest is very bright and reflective, the material is light weight and it takes no time to put it on. The closures are Velcro, strong Velcro. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Christina S.

customer_reviews.title: I love it. I take my dog to work and ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog hates this thing, seriously, he runs when he sees me holding it. However, I love it. I take my dog to work and often times I have to go into a warehouse. I can put this on my dog and take him into the warehouse, we also use it at night on walks and he is highly visible. I highly recommend this product. For the price, it's very high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Fits well, very reflective
customer_reviews.text: I got two larges for my German Shepherds. One is on the smaller side and one is very big but the vests fit both just fine. They are very reflective and bright orange, perfect to use if you take your dogs out on walks after dark or in the woods during hunting season.
customer_reviews.author: brizey93

customer_reviews.title: First one fit perfect. The next two didn’t
customer_reviews.text: The first one I bought fit very well and I loved it. I have a 100lb black lab mastiff mix and it made our walks so much safer. However, one day he lost it when running through the woods. I ordered the XL again and received but this time it was huge and I couldn’t use it. I returned it and then bought a large and the large is too small to use : ( If it weren’t for the size inconsistenicies, I’d rate it a 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany LPM

customer_reviews.title: Super convenient!
customer_reviews.text: I had to return these and size up one for my terrier mix and shitzu. Around 15-17 pounds. They are super convenient. We probably put them on our dogs in not needed situations but it gives me piece of mind that can be seen day or night.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Fit is perfect.
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect fit. My dog is 45#. I got the large, this was the only brand that looked like it was long enough. And it is a perfect fit. It will be great for walking. Especially pically during hunting season.
customer_reviews.author: A Karen

customer_reviews.title: Pretty close to perfect !
customer_reviews.text: Other pet clothing brands should take note of the quality and value you get with this reflective vest. The quality of the material, the reinforced stitching are fantastic. The size is accurate, and the reflective material is head turning in broad daylight ! Plus there is a "pass through" for harness attachment. Excellent product at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: David D

customer_reviews.title: My dog is colored like a deer
customer_reviews.text: My dog is colored like a deer, the size of a small one and even has the white under her tail, so this is great for making her stand out. It is a bit flimsy but she hates anything on her that makes her hot. she weighs 88 lbs and she is a sable German Shepherd and the large just fits. If your dog is bigger it won't fit.
customer_reviews.author: Tamre M

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight Safety Vest
customer_reviews.text: This vest shines bright in the woods and on the beach to let hunters know that my black lab dog is there. lightweight and easy to wash, this vest fits well and is easy to attach with velcro strips, this is a winner! There are night shine (high viz) features so drivers see the dog at night.
customer_reviews.author: jax max man

customer_reviews.title: Dog hunting vest
customer_reviews.text: It fits and dog does not even act like its on. One of mine likes to wear it all the time. We are in the mountains with lots of hunters. These should keep my dogs safe as the orange color and many reflective surfaces for night
customer_reviews.author: 555moose

customer_reviews.title: Now my dog Max is safe!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful product. Nice, soft material, easy to put on and stays on! Not annoying to Max at all. (I also got him a bandanna that is a different material-Max just pulled it off!) Thank you. My back yard is the town forest with wonderful walking paths. But it is hunting season and we hear blasts of guns alot! Now I know that Max can be seen and is safe-so he won't be mistaken for a deer.
customer_reviews.author: Neddi and Max

customer_reviews.title: Easy Effective Valuable
customer_reviews.text: I've only used it twice but so far I'm very happy. Two wide Velcro strips make it easy to secure onto my dog, and withstand the rough and tumble play of two big puppies. It stays in place. It seems comfortable to the dog. It is highly visible. I'm very pleased! I will order a different color if I can so that I can distinguish my nearly identical dogs from a distance.
customer_reviews.author: Susan K.

customer_reviews.title: Great for a big dog
customer_reviews.text: This vest is highly visible, fits my 75lb German Shepherd well, and still has room to expand the Velcro straps if needed. She runs in it & doesn’t pay attention to it, so no complaints here.
customer_reviews.author: Christ

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful vest, very reflective
customer_reviews.text: I bought a large for a 40 lb dog and it's a little too big but because of the velcro I'm keeping it. It's durable and of nice quality. I bought it since my dog runs in the woods and streams, help me keep up with her.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Material isn't strong
customer_reviews.text: The vest had holes in within 2 weeks - shredding from our dog running out in the grasses. Sure sticks got to it but it'd be good to see this made in a more durable fabric. I like the design and the color including that it is reflective. I'd happily pay a higher price for a product that would hold up.
customer_reviews.author: twincity

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 9 pound multipoo really well. Lights up nicely at night when a beam of light hits her. This is our second vest (we live in the country and she wears it anytime she's out with us and not on a leash). The first one lasted 2 years before the velcro got full of burrs and little bits of hay (not the seller's fault). We will keep buying these as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Poppy Pie

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made/sewn
customer_reviews.text: Purchased several of these vests now. Not sure why I keep buying more. I let the dogs run in the farm fields every day for about an hour. This being said, the vests last about 3 months. Stitching is really cheap and things start to come apart real easy. I’ve taken several to the tailors already to have them sewn again. Too bad they don’t use heavier thread on these.
customer_reviews.author: t

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Product
customer_reviews.text: These are low end, poorly made dog vests. They might be fine on an older dog that you walk on leash for 10 minutes each day. We bought 2 for out 1 year old labs and they did not last 10 days. The stitching on the seams all came undone. The velcro pull out. Threw them away. I would not recommend to these if you have dogs that like to run and jump and play and well, be dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Natty Bumpo

customer_reviews.title: Fasteners
customer_reviews.text: The Velcro Fasteners may be ok for City use but in the country in heavy brush are not sufficient... Lost the vest the first time out...
customer_reviews.author: To Bad

customer_reviews.title: Looks good.  Just remember to measure your dogs chest measurment before ordering.  My fault not the supplier.
customer_reviews.text: Looks good so far. I ended up with the wrong size but solved it by adding to the belly band with some Velcro fabric. It fit great otherwise and looks to be good quality. I'll know after a few days in the woods with him. Need to measure the chest to ensure the band is long enough!
customer_reviews.author: airdale

customer_reviews.title: Great product, horrible fit
customer_reviews.text: Medium, which was the correct size based on dog's weight and measurements, was too small. Went up to the large and it's huge! Love everything about this so very disappointed that the fit just doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Doris Ritchie

customer_reviews.title: Great Safety Vest
customer_reviews.text: We ordered these vests to keep our pups safe while out on hikes during hunting season. The vests are super lightweight and comfortable, which is great as our pups are very active and we didn’t want them to over-heat or have their movement restricted in any way. They vests are also bright, and the velcro snaps make them easy to use. They are also a great value for the price. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Pratt

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: Small reflective paw and lettering compared to others I've bought over the years. The sizing also runs small. My dog is usually a medium and I read posts so I got a large and it's still to small
customer_reviews.author: Chris Gould

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - super bright and reflective - good for the price - my dog doesn’t seem to mind wearing it at all Cons: - xl size fits my 100lbs Pyrenees, but it’s pretty close to the end of the Velcro. If your dog is much bigger, it may not fit. - the abdomen strap falls right under the armpit which leaves much of the back of the vest loose, causing it to fold over itself at times. Overall, I’m pretty happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: ABHolland

customer_reviews.title: The price is right
customer_reviews.text: My dogs need blaze orange for running in the woods during hunting season. This vest is very bright and very reflective. The material is not durable, though, and after three weeks one of the vests already has a tear in the fabric and the reflective edging is coming off. However, if it lasts one hunting season, the price is low enough that I will just buy new ones next fall.
customer_reviews.author: Katie E.

customer_reviews.title: Necessary protection for our dog.
customer_reviews.text: It was torn the first time our dog wore it into a wooded area. We have to purchase these often because our dog gets tears in them. We purchase them for his safety for his romps in the woods.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce V

customer_reviews.title: nice and breathable but easily torn - on first time worn.
customer_reviews.text: I fixed this 3 times already. It advertised warranty but will the company stand behind it?
customer_reviews.author: mk wisconsin

customer_reviews.title: Great Color
customer_reviews.text: This vest fit my Ridgeback perfectly and it seems to be very comfortable. We do a lot of hiking and she blends with the area so the color is great and it is very reflective.
customer_reviews.author: Donna OGrady

customer_reviews.title: 4 Paws Vest
customer_reviews.text: This does what I need it to. I think it must be comfortable because Zeus has not chewed it off. I need some thing to make sure my 116 pound deer colored dog is not mistaken for a deer in hunting season. I ordered the largest size and it fits but his next growth spurt will make it too small.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight and highly visible vest
customer_reviews.text: Great lightweight vest that looks well made and should stand up to the wear and tear of country living in Georgia. Love the fluorescent touches since I do have to worry about hunters that have been known to trespass. Would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for hunting seasom
customer_reviews.text: We purchased two of these dog vest because we live in 35 miles out of town in Upper Michigan. Deer season opens November 15 and I did not want some hunter to mistaken my Golden retriever for a deer. These are perfect bright orange light weight easy to put on and take off. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Stan Bigham

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: I have a 125 Doberman and he’s a big guy! He LOVES this. I say want to go on a walk and he would run to the mud room instead of the back yard door because he wanted to wear his vest!! It’s great and he’s brown so seeing him with this on in the summer months especially is awesome on walks!! Highly recommend and so affordable!
customer_reviews.author: smarie

customer_reviews.title: Great vests
customer_reviews.text: Great product. So happy to have these vests on the dogs during hunting season since we walk in the woods daily. Great fit😀
customer_reviews.author: Ann SMA'74

customer_reviews.title: WAY small!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a medium based on the size chart. This would fit my Buddy's 12 lb. Chug but my 50 lb, was funny, if I hadn't bought it for her and needed. Not very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Highly Visible
customer_reviews.text: My little country Chihuahua is visible when he is running through the woods during the day, and outside at night. Coat is very reflective and the paw prints let you know he is a pet. Lightweight and easily fits over his sweater or hoodie.
customer_reviews.author: Ann C

customer_reviews.title: Easy to wear, easy to see.
customer_reviews.text: 45 pound bullie mix that blends in the woods. Ordered the large vest and it fit perfect. Super was to put in. He could move easy, sit, lay, run and do his normal tricks. For a pup distracted by everything, he didn't even notice it after about two minutes.
customer_reviews.author: narno

customer_reviews.title: Love the design and color
customer_reviews.text: I'd give this vest 5 stars except for some of the stitching that has fallen out or missed its mark. I'm fixing that and love these vests for the price. Since my dogs roll in questionable substances, I wash the vest frequently and they come out very well.
customer_reviews.author: P. Lane

customer_reviews.title: If they’ in line of sight you can spot them
customer_reviews.text: As advertised Great adjustability allows for a custom fit on our dogs at size small even though they are not the same measurements DOT style high viz Light weight for spring/summer use Sound hook and loop doesn’t loosen even during a tear-around in the woods Cleans up decently Nice price
customer_reviews.author: David E. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: this was just what i was looking for! I love the water resistant material, and that it is light enough for my pup to wear the whole time he's out. I always worry about him being "seen" at night when we are walking, or if he is just out in the yard during hunting season. This slips right over his harness. It would be great if there were an opening for the "D" ring on the Harness I have to use because he pulls when we walk. But otherwise, it works great
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Webb

customer_reviews.title: ... my dog a little snugger than i would have liked, but i think if i had gone up ...
customer_reviews.text: it did fit my dog a little snugger than i would have liked, but i think if i had gone up a size it would have been way too big Unfortunately, my dog lost it yesterday...didn't have it long; i think i need to go up a size. Dog is a cairn terrier mix/ 23 lb....Small is too small for her :(
customer_reviews.author: Karun

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with the vest but my dog Cisco loves it even more. He is very proud to wear it. He is first in line to put it on. He doesn't like me taking it off and will lean back in his bed making it harder for me to remove. It fits ok . Cisco. Has a large chest but small neck so it is a unusual fit but he flaunts it.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Fits a 40 pound Basset Hound, ok. Highly visible. Good for walking dog in hunting areas. Thorns have scaped it up some, but still wearable. Not a warmth item, though it does break the wind somewhat. Stays on.
customer_reviews.author: P. Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Sizing seems good. Had to return the first one because the Velcro was unusable but return was quick and easy. Material is a little thin. My dog had it on running through thorns most of the day and it held up. Has a couple small tears now but those were from running under a barbed wire fence so not the vests fault. Very good high vis. Very good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Eric J. Soto

customer_reviews.title: Bright- Dog visible in the woods
customer_reviews.text: I hike in wooded areas during hunting season (October -February) and see hunters. They see me and my dog and we do not get shot. That is why we wear blaze orange. The vest stays on the dog and does not impede movement.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Well made, unobtrusive and my dog loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these reflective dog vests and couldn’t be more pleased. They are well made ... very reflective and the design makes it easy to put on your pet. My dogs don’t generally like anything on them but these vests are so lightweight and unobtrusive that my dogs forget they even have them on. The size chart was perfect as far as determining the correct size to purchase. I would highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: These vests are great. When we are in the State Forest with our dogs during hunting season they wear them. They are easy to put on and take off and the fit well. We bought them for our Giant Schnauzer and Standard Schnauzer. Now our dogs are the best dressed ones in the Forrest.
customer_reviews.author: Bix

customer_reviews.title: Good for light use.  Wouldn't recommend for hunting/active dogs.
customer_reviews.text: While the price is nice it is also reflected in the quality. If you want it for just taking walks it would be GREAT. The fit is wonderful and easy to adjust. If you want to use it for hunting, or your dog will be running around in the woods it gets ripped easily and comes apart.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah V

customer_reviews.title: Fabric is bright orange and nice and the markings are very reflective
customer_reviews.text: Fabric is bright orange and nice and the markings are very reflective. The fit is a little wide on the back end nearest the tail. It fkaurs out in a strange way. I ordered one from another company at the same time. It was less expensive and fit better but the fabric was flimsy. Both were size large but IOC was much larger.
customer_reviews.author: C. HALL

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: My dog is on the small end of large. The vest is adjustable, and fits perfectly. It is reflective so when I walk him at night he can be seen. It is perfect and a good price and value.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Bright and reflective
customer_reviews.text: The most important aspect of this vest is the visibility! I have a small red merle Australian shepherd dog who is completely camouflaged in the brush and dirt when I'm out with him horseback riding or hiking. He is very visible with his bright orange vest now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I wanted. It's easy to put on and fits well. My dog wears a harness with a back leash loop. The vest neck adjusts easily to allow his leash to attach. If possible, you might add a reinforced slit in the back for harness loops.
customer_reviews.author: ratsmom62

customer_reviews.title: Easy on/off - GREAT!  Fabric so light concerned won't last
customer_reviews.text: Got the XL for our 86 lb rescue. Fits perfectly. So get a size up. Haven't used on a walk yet - but concerned as fabric is much thinner than I had imagined it would be. So holding out an opinion till I see how long it lasts. 12 month warranty BUT lots of "but not responsible for wear and tear". etc. We'll see.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Mia

customer_reviews.title: A tight fit on my 70 lb dog but still usable
customer_reviews.text: I don't see how this could fit on a 100 lb+ dog as the description says, but for us it works. Our dog is 70 lbs and it's a little tight but workable. She now associates it with going in the woods and goes crazy. It's lightweight and mostly durable. I recommend it for the price alone.
customer_reviews.author: Crontab

customer_reviews.title: Good little safety vest
customer_reviews.text: This works great when I take my small dog for walks in the early morning when it's still dark out. The reflective material lights up really well!
customer_reviews.author: bettywolfe

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so happy to have this hunter orange designation for my dog. I probably should have ordered the XL because of her chest girth (34”) but her neck fit the L. Anyway, it fits and I feel relieved that she won’t get shot by a hunter. Excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

product_meta.title: Dog Safety Reflective Vest 5 Sizes to fit dogs 10 lbs -130 lbs : High Visibility for Outdoor Activity Day and Night, Keep Your Dog Visible, Safe From Cars & Hunting Accidents | Blaze Orange vest
feature_bullets: ★ HIGH VISIBILITY REFLECT VEST - Treat your dog with the best he deserves. Make your 4legged friend highly visible to drivers for improved road safety. This is perfect for morning and evening walks.

★ EXCEPTIONAL DESIGN - Modern strong hi viz orange blaze color with reflective prints that is easily seen from 500 feet at night. Safe & comfortable Velcro closure straps make it super easy and quick to take on and be ready for a walk, and with the soft fabric touch your 4 legged friend will love his new outfit.

★ DURABLE MATERIALS - This jacket is made of premium quality rip-resistant breathable soft touch fabric. It is waterproof for rain or snow, easy to clean and has extra stitched Velcro straps for long lasting durability.

★ EASY TO USE - After putting it on your dog simply adjust it so your dog will feel comfortable using it. This Vest lightweight and made of soft fabrics. Your dog will love to use it for any outdoor activity.

★ OUR PROMISE - Grab this deal now and get our exclusive 100% hassle-free Money-Back Guarantee. If you for ANY reason don't like your Brand-New Dog Vest, simply contact us for a full refund. No questions asked. Buy now RISK-FREE.
